Package ru.geekbrains.hexcore

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
ru.geekbrains.hexcore.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Terrain, Unit
public abstract class Tile extends Object
Basic ABSTRACT class for all hex based entities like Units and Terrain, Strategic points

      Parameters:
      destination - Tile of interest - final point of the way
      Returns:
